Notes: Returns all inventory items for display in grid. No filters.
Returns next available batch number from inv_inventory_batch_seq table. Increment and return last_batch_number.
Only appears in code comment - not a real call
Advanced search with 17 parameters. Supports pagination and sorting. Similar to inv_transactions_SmartSearch but with more filters.
Returns 1 if item type exists in md_item_types table, 0 otherwise. Used for validation before add.
Returns SELECT DISTINCT ItemType FROM md_item_types ORDER BY ItemType. Used to populate dropdowns.
Returns 1 if location exists in md_locations table, 0 otherwise. Used for validation before add.
Returns 1 if operation exists in md_operation_numbers table, 0 otherwise. Used for validation before add.
Change call to md_part_ids_Get_ByItemNumber and extract ItemType column from result. Existing procedure returns full record.
Returns RoleId for given RoleName from sys_roles table. SELECT RoleId FROM sys_roles WHERE RoleName = p_RoleName.
Inserts quick button at specific position. Shift existing buttons at/after that position. Similar to AddQuickButton_1 but with explicit position.
Deletes quick button at position and shifts remaining buttons. Similar to RemoveAndShift but different naming.
Deletes all quick buttons for user. DELETE FROM sys_last_10_transactions WHERE User = p_User.
Change call to sys_last_10_transactions_Move_1. Same functionality.
Deletes all UI settings for user. DELETE FROM usr_ui_settings WHERE UserId = p_UserId.
Returns JSON settings for user. SELECT SettingJson FROM usr_ui_settings WHERE UserId = p_UserId. Or use usr_ui_settings_Get and extract column.
Change call to sys_user_roles_Get_ById or query sys_user_roles table. May need to join usr_users to sys_user_roles.
Updates single user field. UPDATE usr_users SET {Field} = p_Value WHERE User = p_User. Dynamic column name.
